name: Untitled Wizard Game Beta
description:
This is an arcade style first person game.  It is built around getting a high score and surviving for as long as possible. There are multiple different abilities for different play styles. This was made in a custom engine, designed around allowing mod support. The game currently does have support for mods, however I still need to write documentation. I have spent the last two years working on this engine, and I have based it on features I like in other engines. 

This is a beta.
